# gitpretty - Complete Reference

> Make your git history beautiful

## Overview

gitpretty is a toolkit of bash scripts and GitHub Actions that transform plain git workflows into visually appealing, emoji-enhanced experiences.

## Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/nirholas/gitpretty.git ~/.gitpretty
chmod +x ~/.gitpretty/*.sh ~/.gitpretty/scripts/*.sh
```

## Core Scripts

### emoji-file-commits.sh
Adds unique emojis to each file, visible in GitHub's file browser.
```bash
./emoji-file-commits.sh /path/to/repo
```

### emoji-commits.sh
Safe mode using --allow-empty commits (no file modifications).
```bash
./emoji-commits.sh /path/to/repo
```

### emoji-log.sh
Beautiful git log viewer with multiple styles.
```bash
./scripts/emoji-log.sh              # compact (default)
./scripts/emoji-log.sh graph        # ASCII graph
./scripts/emoji-log.sh today        # today's commits
./scripts/emoji-log.sh week         # this week by day
./scripts/emoji-log.sh author       # group by author
./scripts/emoji-log.sh stats -n 10  # with file stats
```

### emoji-branch.sh
Create branches with type prefixes.
```bash
./scripts/emoji-branch.sh feature user-auth  # â†’ feature/user-auth
./scripts/emoji-branch.sh fix login-bug      # â†’ fix/login-bug
```

### emoji-merge.sh
Merge branches with emoji messages based on branch type.
```bash
./scripts/emoji-merge.sh feature/user-auth   # â†’ âœ¨ Merge feature: user-auth
./scripts/emoji-merge.sh fix/login-bug       # â†’ ğŸ› Merge fix: login-bug
```

### emoji-tag.sh
Create release tags with emoji prefixes.
```bash
./scripts/emoji-tag.sh v1.0.0 major   # â†’ ğŸ’¥ v1.0.0
./scripts/emoji-tag.sh v1.1.0 minor   # â†’ âœ¨ v1.1.0
./scripts/emoji-tag.sh v1.1.1 patch   # â†’ ğŸ› v1.1.1
```

### emoji-hooks.sh
Install git hooks for automatic emoji commits.
```bash
./scripts/emoji-hooks.sh install    # install hooks
./scripts/emoji-hooks.sh uninstall  # remove hooks
./scripts/emoji-hooks.sh status     # check status
```

Hooks installed:
- commit-msg: auto-add emoji prefix
- pre-push: show push summary
- post-commit: celebration message

## GitHub Actions

### emoji-commits.yml
Auto-beautify on push to main.

### commit-lint.yml
Validate PR commits have emoji prefixes.

### changelog.yml
Generate changelog grouped by emoji type on release.
